content: this design is my love letter to vintage aran knitting the fisherman-seaside aesthetic and my childhood memories of windy brisk holidays along the norfolk coast the honey & salt hat is knit flat and then seamed and makes the perfect challenge for knitters who want to start combining cabling techniques for a unique texture once knit up this hat is thick warm and cozy making it the perfect addition to any late autumn/winter wardrobe difficulty level one size fits all advanced beginner/intermediate circumference 52 cm length with folded cuff 16 cm techniques used total length unfolded cuff 24 cm -
